points: + prefix can now be customized on the dashboard
Leaving it blank will completely remove secondary prefix
Just mentioning the bot will tell you it's prefix
Bot is now cluster sharded
Moved base site to censor.bot
Moved dashboard to dash.censor.bot
Moved api to api.censor.bot
Allows for toggling between full message censor and specific word censor
Implemented {t:0IsZQKg2:Resend Replace}
Can now make resend send as spoilers or hashtags
Updates are hosted on bot now
Now uses /v instead of /#v and hashing
Some design changed too
Implemented {t:RmN5MKz8:Dashboard Logs}
Every single bit of code rewritten
Moved to custom library, no longer discord.js (cuz it sux)
Uses client subclasses, like handlers and manager.
Uses this instead of client in all situations possible
Improved logger :weary:
Everything is one process, "internal sharding" if you will.
API and Dashboard now on the same domain
Added {t:CSgpsb57:base languages} settings and configurator. Add or remove specific languages to censor.
Removed antighostping entirely
API is in a prepared state to do multiple clients in the future ;)
Presence now has a class manager
Buckets now used for deleting messages and pop message to better counteract spam
Webhook resend now uses buckets as well
Resend now censors specific parts of the message (biiiig improvement)
Tickets are gone for now:tm:
Finished {t:HHmNEX9U:Restructure}
Implemented {t:C7DLzanj:Filter Backups}
Added ctrl+s to save settings
Added debug command for easier support
Sorts roles by position in dashboard
Reworked events, so that they're reloadable
{t:IC8NRFbX:Multi-Message} completed
When enabled, will combine multiple messages from the user in a row.
Will keep stacking until the message is censored! No more bypasses
This has been an idea for way too long, finally done.
Note: premium feature
Hover over the title of each setting for description
Has description for each setting now, obv
More {t:Pwr9q9g2:punishment types}
Mute type
Kick type
Ban type
Remove of punishment toggle
^ instead there's just now an off option
Prepared for time mutes
Punishments interface remade into class
^ This will open up to easier interaction
Remade emsg handler to use uncached and raw events
Remade nick handler to use uncached and raw events
Remade react handler to use uncached and raw events
Began {t:1AhEnpFP:username censoring}
Began deprecation of anti-ghostping
Added more aliases to common commands
Opened up command list endpoint, built through ejs for interface {t:YNEeRhaL:trello}
(Endpoints: designed; https://api.jt3ch.net/censorbot/cmd | api; https://api.jt3ch.net/censorbot/cmd.json)
Replaced censorbot.jt3ch.net/commands with new interface
Replaced top.gg page with new interface
Finally fully removed all deprecated one command settings commands (like +on, +filter, etc.)
Uncensor has been added to the dashboard
Uncensor now censors based on keys and if it matches a key, it stops. Rather than just stopping if it matches at all
Added some presence features
Happy new decade ;)
If there is no DB entry, dash will make one and fill with blank config, just in case
* Same with punishment users, will no longer just return if the server doesn't have a config
Fixed bug where message author would be punished for innap reactions
Removed ability to go to 0 on punishment amount creating error message
Log now can be none, and default is so, no more errors
Fixed punishment system so 1 warning = 1 warning
Uncensor system disabled until it's been rewritten properly
Settings command disabled
Punishments command disabled
^ Both now redirect to the dashboard
New join guild message
Checks if there's a database entry before sending message
Filter moved to separate process
Bot now uses restful methods for said filter
Should take up less resources as well as be a bit faster
Premium section of dashboard at /premium
Removed reload servers button
Added apis for premium management for dash
No more commands needed for it owo
Dashboard now contains resend setting
Dashboard now contains channels setting
Both of the above now supported in API
Grid layout redone to fit new settings
Premium now exposed at backend layer
Dashboard uses grid now
New saving and comparison
Redone mobile design to look actually good
Dashboard now has OpenGraph cool stuff
Redone colors and buttons
Dashboard is now EJS based, and has cool things, really difficult to explain it all
POSTing new settings is now a one time thing
Endpoints have been separated into version endpoints, current /v3
Toggleables are no +settings [categpry] on/off
^ Rather than +settings [cateogry] set on/off
{t:y1kkQrla:trello}

desc: Changed limit on poptime for premium
points: Non-premium is limited to 120 second delete time
Premium will have a limit of up to 600 seconds

desc: Fixed server filter on base filter disclude
points: Server filter can now contain words from the base filter
^ the base filter just has to be on
Whenever the base filter is toggled on, the server filter is cleared
Created seperated base filter toggle
msg, emsg, nick, and react, no longer correspond to base filter
Changed censor to method in settings, added base for toggling base filter
Added +settings command
Deprecating other settings commands
Backend for webhook and channels, are in premium
All database interaction has been moved to a one class, which will allow for new db in the future
If that wasnt obvious enough, db will likely change soon!
Addressed and implemented {t:hu7eV522:toggle specific filters}
+on and +off now take an argument as to which filter to toggle (or all)
Api still needs to be updated, right now, POST sets all to true, GET returns the value of (if) message filter is on
When a message is censored, the log will now <u>underline</u> the actual word that was recognized as a curse
trello idea: {t:3sV2zEAe:here}
Example: here
Added unicode emoji censoring, accessible by adding the name of the emoji to the filter list (this also works for reactions)
Fixed reactions not properly logging when reacting with innapropriate unicode emojis
{t:ybbgGv2o:trello reference}
When pressing invite to server it now creates a popup
When done inviting, callback with rehash
If returns 401 when 2 it rehashed
^ This fixed issues when someone kicks the bot after selecting the server in the dashboard (idk)
Tickets now stored in database
Tickets now can be managed by JPBBot for faster reaction
Addressed and implemented {t:KkUUZ1TH:bad emoji reaction delete}
Due to the redesign, to keep everything clean these have been removed
They may make a comeback when im not stupidly lazy to make a db for it
Note: if you had a backup that you wanted to reget I still have most of them, DM jpbberry

desc: Destructs code blocks, deprecated another idea
points: Addressed and fixed {t:zjNEd4zo:destruct code blocks}
Deprecated and canceled the development of {t:9Pj6zkE4:settings ui}
Brand new organization for everything having to do with the bot
DBs now use the raw rethink nodes, rather than the stupid wrapper i made lmao

desc: Huge rewrite of API and Dashboard
points: CAPI now relies bot cache rather than Discord's API
CAPI now runs on manager
Major Performance Increases due to that
Full dashboard rewrite
UI speed and responsiveness increase
Website now relies on updated things rather than re-get
Everything is great dont @ me

desc: Moved from array'd roles to single string
points: Roles are now strings rather than [array, of, strings]
No roles are now null rather than strung 'none'
API now presents object rather than array of objects
Planned update {t:z1TaxRpn:multiple censor roles} has been canceled

desc: Added yet again, more dashboard features
points: Index page now has a no popup button, which allows redirects rather than popup
Fixed a few scripts for unsupportive engines, such as IE, Safari and older FireFox clients
Moved to dedicated window popup, rather than then using jQuery

desc: Fixed small bug in updates site
points: Bug; console would error out that module isn't defined
Effected; all those console dwellers :eyes:
Point of failure; no es6 support because it's a browser but I need module for endpoint usage
Fixed by; adding a var module = module || {}; allow for either to be interacted with
ServerID's now stored as hashes
All setting points have been moved into folder to look nicer :p
^ Due to this, all the .html variants have been REMOVED from the static site
All interaction functions have been moved to two main clientRequest and authRequest for interaction
Easy dynamic integration has been added
Faster cookie => localStorage swap and use processing
Added message to the bottom of the screen to let the user know when a request is in process
^ This is attached to every authRequest(), allowing all request to be further regarded to the user
Endpoint changed into seperate methods
All different types of purposes moved to the same point
Dashboard fully updated to use authenticated server requests
Fixed owner no roles => no permissions glitch
Added API documentation here
Database interaction fully changed, making it much faster
Authorization fully changed, now requires a header that looks like 'ServerID Bearer'
Endpoint now waits for database to be updated before sending a response
^ Webpanel now uses this and waits for response to actually refresh the settings, this decreases chances of having to reload to see changes
Errors no longer push you back to the home page, (Unless a bearer mismatch), instead will make a simple alert box with a user friendly error message
Dashboard now has better interactability styling, like pointer cursors on buttons, and opacity changes on hover

desc: Fixed server filter being affected by base off bug
points: Instead of killing filter if off, takes global into consideration
Point of failure; new 1.9.0

desc: Large Everything to do with filter Update
points: Moved to class base filtering
Moved to class based resolving
Filter hotswapping much faster
Matching against array largely optimized
Edited message & nickname censoring have been brough to the same level as messages in priority
Edited message and nickname log embed now has inline fields
Log message is now class based
Admin log message is now class based
Less unneeded recognition when it comes to role & field uncensoring
Linked bypasses being worked on extensively
Much more that im too lazy to go in on sorry
WebSocketManager Changed node-ws => uWebSocket (uws)
Ping has been sliced more than a half!
Better and faster message reaction
Warning for when users try to set the channel to general
To prevent new users from setting their channel to general and proceed to complain about it in the support server
The command can now take an extra argument of --, to allow override of this general chat log ban
No longer looks like it errors for brand new setlogs which scare away new users
Now awaits for the channel to update to avoid said error, so now has a warning that it'll take a little bit.
Commands are now aliased on the backend
Commands that just said 'same as ...' removed from help menu
These aliases can now be found on the commands page
Added commands page
Added link to said page in the footer
Check out the Index Site it's much different now :p

desc: Fixed Edited Message & Nickname Log Message
points: Fixed concatenation for users in Nickname log
Fixed concatenation for users in Edied Message log
Fixed concatenation for channels in Nickname log
Fixed concatenation for channels in Edited Message log
Also fixed the default avatarURL for users in edited message and nickname log
Bug: Punishments settings help would delete instantly
Reporter: Kriscross102#5789
Point of failure: New system for deleting messages over time
Fixed By: Fixing said new system, all is well
Moved from Discord.JS v11 to v12.0.0-dev
Sharding and stability changes
If you notice anything messed up DM the owner please!
Added new command +punishments
Added warning counter every censor, (if punishments are enabled)
Setting punishment example: +punishments set 3 @role
^ This means people will get @role after they curse 3 times!
Turns new line (\n) into spaces instead!
Fixed 1+1 length arg combination
Added new 1+* combination
^ If arg1 length is 1, and arg2 length isn't 1, then it will append arg1 to the beginning of arg2
Added date to every update
Show's update on every update on the site
Moved all ticket warnings, and bans to database
All ticket warnings have been reset as a side-effect
Updated shard count; 3 > 4
Made favicon via dynamic endpoints
Made stats on home page via dynamic endpoints
Go back avatars, on the updates and supports websitr set to use dynamic endpoints
Added TODO for remaking the commands part of the index page
This will also become dynamic once its done
OG data is now dependent
Meaning individual updates will have their own og data
By using the endpoints https://censorbot.jt3ch.net/updates/v/VERSION_NUMBER
The censorbot.ml website has been officially retired.
Instead of saying [message] | Mistake? do +ticket, it's just only [message]
This is to avoid randos constantly joining and getting mad when words that should be censored, are, get this, censored, wow!
As much as we've done to prevent false tickets, there's always idiots.
Made all endpoints dependent on database, rather than bot connecting to the websocket
^^ Increase speed overall
Better responsiveness on actual webpage
Fixed some typos :p

desc: Added embed for latest updates in OG
points: Added OG meta data for the site
It will update every new update, they don't last forever but it's cool :p
Added api/servercount endpoint
Using said endpoint on the index page and now there's server count there again!
Fixed Custom Filter section where "Add your own words" wouldn't link
Just to
Test the changing
Between two updates
Added updates
